name: Blacklane GmbH
goal: Blacklane is the premium mobility provider. The company covers the first and last miles and feet of your journey. We provide peace of mind in more than 50 countries and 260 cities with chauffeured rides and in 500 airports with airport concierge services and lounge access.
euInitiatives: Digital single market for transportation. Ride-hailing, taxi and similar transportation frameworks.
